name: A. Broken Clock
statement:
You are given a broken clock. You know, that it is supposed to show time
in 12- or 24-hours format. In 12-hours format hours change from to ,
while in 24-hours it changes from to . In both formats minutes change
from to .You are given a time in format that is currently displayed on
the broken clock. Your goal is to change minimum number of digits in
order to make clocks display the correct time in the given format.For
example, if is displayed, it is enough to replace the second with in
order to get that is a correct time in 24-hours format. However, to make
correct in 12-hours format, one has to change at least two digits.
Additionally to the first change one can replace the second with and
obtain .
